channel.title: Comments on: Yeasted Meringue Coffee Cake – Daring Bakers Challenge March 2011

item.title: By: Amelia Ching
item.dc:creator: Amelia Ching
item.description:
Hi there,
I have an award for you, http://stvmiapreciousmoments.blogspot.com/2011/04/my-very-first-award.html
TQ
item.content:encoded:
Hi there,

I have an award for you, http://stvmiapreciousmoments.blogspot.com/2011/04/my-very-first-award.html

TQ

item.title: By: Mei Sze
item.dc:creator: Mei Sze
item.description:
The sweet yeast dough was so soft and beautiful to work with. Really love this dough. I got confused with the word 'coffee' when we had a class on 'coffee scrolls' but yes..no coffee in it; just that it's meant to be served with coffee/tea/hot chocolate :)
My reaction was more of 'Bread again?" We've been baking bread every week since the start of the semester and every class, I had to take home 40 rolls/buns + 4 -5 large loaves each - white, pasta duras, olive loaves, sourdough and even rye.
Still...a very tasty challenge! :)
Mei Sze
item.content:encoded:
The sweet yeast dough was so soft and beautiful to work with. Really love this dough. I got confused with the word ‘coffee’ when we had a class on ‘coffee scrolls’ but yes..no coffee in it; just that it’s meant to be served with coffee/tea/hot chocolate ðŸ™‚

My reaction was more of ‘Bread again?” We’ve been baking bread every week since the start of the semester and every class, I had to take home 40 rolls/buns + 4 -5 large loaves each – white, pasta duras, olive loaves, sourdough and even rye.

Still…a very tasty challenge! ðŸ™‚

Mei Sze

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: (Tell me it isn't so....does anyone really think there's coffee in coffee cake??) Anyway...this has been an intriguing challenge. I've loved what all of you have done and the idea of a meringue layer sounds wonderful. A great job!
item.content:encoded:
(Tell me it isn’t so….does anyone really think there’s coffee in coffee cake??)
Anyway…this has been an intriguing challenge. I’ve loved what all of you have done and the idea of a meringue layer sounds wonderful.
A great job!

item.title: By: Jamie
item.dc:creator: Jamie
item.description: Beautiful! I really think this is pretty much a foolproof coffee cake and love it! Yours is perfect! Mmmm I am staring at the slice with the gorgeous texture and now I'd love another piece!
item.content:encoded: Beautiful! I really think this is pretty much a foolproof coffee cake and love it! Yours is perfect! Mmmm I am staring at the slice with the gorgeous texture and now I’d love another piece!

item.title: By: Rosa
item.dc:creator: Rosa
item.description:
A beautiful coffee cake! It looks delicious.
Cheers,
Rosa
item.content:encoded:
A beautiful coffee cake! It looks delicious.

Cheers,

Rosa

item.title: By: Kim
item.dc:creator: Kim
item.description: I too put mine in the fridge overnight and even though I took it out for a bit the next morning I didn't feel like it rose as much as it would have the night before. And I had a watery, gooey mass of filling on the pan in the morning. It wasn't too bad, just like molten lava when it came out of the oven. Nice job on the challenge!
item.content:encoded: I too put mine in the fridge overnight and even though I took it out for a bit the next morning I didn’t feel like it rose as much as it would have the night before. And I had a watery, gooey mass of filling on the pan in the morning. It wasn’t too bad, just like molten lava when it came out of the oven. Nice job on the challenge!

item.title: By: Sheena
item.dc:creator: Sheena
item.description: Coffee cake is a misleading name haha. Despite the meringue leaking out, your cake looks lovely, and it still got a fair bit of heigh during baking. Chocolate and nuts are the perfect combination!
item.content:encoded: Coffee cake is a misleading name haha. Despite the meringue leaking out, your cake looks lovely, and it still got a fair bit of heigh during baking. Chocolate and nuts are the perfect combination!

item.title: By: katie
item.dc:creator: katie
item.description: Your cake looks great. Love the flavours of chocolate and walnut together.
item.content:encoded: Your cake looks great. Love the flavours of chocolate and walnut together.

item.title: By: Cath@dunnntoperfection.blogspot.com
item.dc:creator: Cath@dunnntoperfection.blogspot.com
item.description: LOL! My husband was in the coffee hating category you mentioned until I managed to convince him that there was NO coffee in it! Looks like you did a great job with the finished product - def lovely to have with a Hot Chocolate too! :)
item.content:encoded:
LOL! My husband was in the coffee hating category you mentioned until I managed to convince him that there was NO coffee in it!
Looks like you did a great job with the finished product – def lovely to have with a Hot Chocolate too! ðŸ™‚
